<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orc Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=91) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=86)

</column>

---

Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), the [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), and all [orc](/Traits.aspx?ID=124) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Orc Weapon Expertise
